text: Josh or Joshua Allen may refer to: * Josh Allen (offensive lineman) (born 1991), former American football player * Josh Allen (quarterback) (born 1996), American football quarterback in the NFL for the Buffalo Bills since 2018 * Josh Hines-Allen (born 1997), American football defensive end in the NFL for the Jacksonville Jaguars. He was previously known as Josh Allen before changing his name.
title: Josh Allen
